news.title: Trump says US attorney general should release any 'credible' information on Epstein
news.summary: The president also said "only really bad people" want to stoke theories about the well-connected sex offender.

news.title: Man who murdered British backpacker Peter Falconio dies
news.summary: Bradley Murdoch, who was serving a life sentence in prison, never disclosed the location of Peter Falconio's remains.

news.title: Tribunal over nurse's changing room row with trans doctor to resume
news.summary: The hearings for Sandie Peggie's case against NHS Fife and transgender medic Dr Beth Upton began in February.

news.title: Why is South Korea retrying a spy chief who assassinated a president?
news.summary: Hearings began Wednesday in a retrial of Kim Jae-gyu, who was executed for killing Park Chung-hee.

news.title: Driver held for hit-and-run death of world's 'oldest' marathon runner
news.summary: Fauja Singh was out on his afternoon walk on Monday when he was hit by a speeding car. Police have arrested the driver.

news.title: Labubu firm sees profit soaring by at least 350%
news.summary: Sales, branding and tight cost controls have helped Pop Mart's profits balloon in the first half of 2025.

news.title: Trump launches probe into Brazil's 'unfair' trade practices
news.summary: Last week, the US president urged Brazilian authorities to end their prosecution of the country's former President Jair Bolsonaro.

news.title: 'McIlroy's got it going, you need to see this' - Rory's Portrush record
news.summary: As the Open Championship returns to Royal Portrush, those who saw Rory McIlroy shoot a record 61 around the course as a 16-year-old remember it as the day he went to "the next level" in his career.
